about.title: About Voice Out
about.subtitle: Why We Created This Platform for You
about.description: Voice Out was born from our desire to create a space where you, as an immigrant in Germany, can freely express your experiences and feelings.
about.motivation: We understand that life in Germany can be both rewarding and challenging. As immigrants ourselves or children of immigrants, we know that sometimes you might face situations where you feel unfairly treated or misunderstood. We created Voice Out because we believe your stories deserve to be heard.
about.achieve: By providing this platform, we aim to:
about.achieve-1: Give you a safe space to share your experiences in Germany
about.achieve-2: Help you connect with others who may have gone through similar situations
about.achieve-3: Raise awareness about the challenges immigrants face in everyday life in Germany
about.achieve-4: Promote understanding and empathy within our diverse community
about.achieve-5: Empower you to speak up and seek support when needed
about.matters: Every story you share on Voice Out is important. By speaking out, you're:
about.matters-1: Helping other immigrants realize they're not alone in their experiences
about.matters-2: Contributing to a more accurate picture of immigrant life in Germany
about.matters-3: Potentially helping to shape a more inclusive environment for all of us
about.matters-4: Inspiring others to stand up against unfair treatment
about.vision-1: We dream of a Germany where all of us, regardless of where we or our parents came from, feel truly at home. We believe that by sharing our stories and experiences, we can help create a more understanding and inclusive society for everyone.
about.vision-2: Join us in this important conversation. Whether you're sharing your own story, reading about others' experiences, or telling your friends about Voice Out, you're helping to build a stronger, more connected immigrant community in Germany.
about.vision-3: Together, we can make our voices heard and work towards a Germany that feels like home for all of us.

intro.title: Voice Out
intro.subtitle: Speak Up Against Discrimination in Germany
intro.welcome: Welcome to Voice Out, a platform dedicated to amplifying the voices of those who have faced discrimination, with a special focus on the experiences of immigrants.
intro.description: Every day, people encounter discrimination in various forms - at work, in public spaces, or even in their own neighborhoods. These experiences often go unheard, but at Voice Out, we believe every story deserves to be shared and listened to.
intro.encouragement: Whether you're an immigrant who has faced prejudice, or anyone who has witnessed or experienced discrimination, we encourage you to voice out. By sharing our stories, we can raise awareness, foster understanding, and work towards a more inclusive society.
intro.purpose: Here, you can share your stories, connect with others who understand, and contribute to making Germany a more inclusive place for all of us.
